info_about_us: We believe that your website should be unique and reflect the personality of your business. Therefore, we use only the most advanced technologies and tools to create websites that will not only look professional, but also be functional and user-friendly.
html_description: a standardized hypertext markup language for viewing web pages in a browser.
css_description: a formal language for describing the appearance of a document written using a markup language.
js_description: multi-paradigm programming language. Supports object-oriented, imperative and functional styles.
react_description: an open source library for developing user interfaces.
boostrap_description: free set of tools for creating websites and web applications. Includes HTML and CSS templates.
node_description: a software platform based on the V8 engine that transforms JavaScript from a highly specialized language into a general-purpose language.
block_layout_description: this is an approach in which the site is built on the basis of blocks, div tags act as blocks.
adaptive_layout_description: this is the formation of a document structure that automatically changes the page depending on the size of the user's screen.
